paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.streaming._
import org.apache.spark.streaming.twitter._
import org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel
import scala.io.Source
import java.io._
import org.apache.log4j.Logger
import org.apache.log4j.Level
import sys.process.stringSeqToProcess
import com.vdurmont.emoji.EmojiParser

object TweetUtil {
    val userRegex = """(?<=^|(?<=[^a-zA-Z0-9-_.]))@([A-Za-z]+[A-Za-z0-9]+)"""
    val urlRegex = """http[s]?://(?:[a-zA-Z]|[0-9]|[$-_@.&+]|[!*(),]|(?:%[0-9a-fA-F][0-9a-fA-F]))+"""
    val spaceRegex = """\s+"""

    def normalize(s: Option[String]): Option[String] = s match {
        case Some(s) => Option(EmojiParser.removeAllEmojis(s.replaceAll(userRegex, "USER").replaceAll(urlRegex, "URL").replace("#", "").replaceAll(spaceRegex, " ")))
        case _ => None
    }
}

/** Configures the Oauth Credentials for accessing Twitter */
def configureTwitterCredentials(apiKey: String, apiSecret: String, accessToken: String, accessTokenSecret: String) {
  val configs = collection.immutable.HashMap(
    "apiKey" -> apiKey, "apiSecret" -> apiSecret, "accessToken" -> accessToken, "accessTokenSecret" -> accessTokenSecret)
  println("Configuring Twitter OAuth")
  configs.foreach{ case(key, value) =>
    if (value.trim.isEmpty) {
      throw new Exception("Error setting authentication - value for " + key + " not set")
    }
    val fullKey = "twitter4j.oauth." + key.replace("api", "consumer")
    System.setProperty(fullKey, value.trim)
    println("\tProperty " + fullKey + " set as [" + value.trim + "]")
  }
  println()
}

// Configure Twitter credentials
val apiKey = z.input("Twitter API key").toString
val apiSecret = z.input("Twitter API secret").toString
val accessToken = z.input("Twitter access token").toString
val accessTokenSecret = z.input("Twitter access token secret").toString

configureTwitterCredentials(apiKey, apiSecret, accessToken, accessTokenSecret)

import org.apache.spark.streaming.twitter._
import org.apache.spark.streaming.{Seconds, StreamingContext}

val ssc = new StreamingContext(sc, Seconds(2))
val tweets = TwitterUtils.createStream(ssc, None)
val twt = tweets.window(Seconds(60))

import sqlContext.implicits._
case class Tweet(text:String, lang: String) extends Serializable
twt.map(status=>
  Tweet(TweetUtil.normalize(Option(status.getText())).getOrElse(""), status.getLang())
).filter(_.lang == "en")
.foreachRDD(rdd=>
  rdd.toDF().createOrReplaceTempView("tweets")
)

//twt.print

ssc.start()
